page.title: 09GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: We are in class 2R, William Austin Junior School, Austin Road, Luton. We did a Doomsday project on playground games. Here is a list: 1. Hide and seek tag 17. Line tag 2. Poisen 18. Long jumps 3. Stoolball 19. Soldiercreep 4. Obstacle Race 20. Gym class 5. Dares 21. Throw & catch 6. Chase 22. Runing races 7. Non-stop cricket 23. Bulldog 8. Tigtag Tommy home 24. Rounders 9. Cricket 25. Ball tag 10.French skipping 26. Kiss chance 11.Tennis 27. What's the 12.Netball time Mr.Wolf? 13.Football 28. Tag 14.Cats got measles 29. Leap frog 15.Bob-down tag 30. Softball 16.England,Ireland, 31. Knives,forks, Scotland,Wales spoons
